examples.desc: Find all elements within document.body so elements like head, script, etc. are excluded.
examples.code:
var elementCount = $("#test").find("*").css("border","3px solid red").length; $("body").prepend("

" + elementCount + " elements found

");

entries.longdesc: Caution: The all, or universal, selector is extremely slow, except when used by itself.
